text: KebonaabobalusabelayoubizolweNkosiyabo(ngokwamkela i-Islam) okwabo iya kuba kokulungileyo (iPaladesi) kodwa abo bangazanga balusabele ubizo lwaKhe (uAll√¢h), enokuba konke okusehlabathini ibingaba kokwabo, baze bafune ukunikela ngako konke befuna ukuzisindisa (esohlwayweni bekungayi kwamkelwa).
